insert into feed (feed_seq, customer_seq, checkin, contents, congestion ) values( feed_seq.nextval, #{customer_seq}, #{checkin}, #{contents}, #{congestion} )
SELECT feed_seq.currval FROM dual
mapper.select: select f.feed_seq,f.customer_seq,f.checkin,f.contents,f.congestion,f.likes, f.inputdate, c.customer_seq, c.email, c.pw, c.name, c.nick, c.profileimg, c.customer_type from feed f,customer c where f.customer_seq = c.customer_seq order by f.inputdate desc
mapper.update: update feed set likes = likes+1 where feed_seq = #{feed_seq}
update feed set likes = likes-1 where feed_seq = #{feed_seq}
mapper.select: select * from feed f,customer c where f.feed_seq = #{feed_seq} and f.customer_seq = c.customer_seq
select count(*) from feed where customer_seq = #{customer_seq}

select f.feed_seq,f.customer_seq,f.checkin,f.contents,f.congestion,f.likes, f.inputdate, c.customer_seq, c.email, c.pw, c.name, c.nick, c.profileimg, c.customer_type from feed f,customer c where f.customer_seq = c.customer_seq and f.customer_seq = #{customer_seq} order by f.inputdate desc

select distinct f.feed_seq,f.customer_seq,f.checkin,f.contents,f.congestion,f.likes, f.inputdate, c.customer_seq, c.email, c.pw, c.name, c.nick, c.profileimg, c.customer_type from feed f,customer c, hashtag h where f.customer_seq = c.customer_seq and f.feed_seq = h.feed_seq and (checkin like '%' || #{search} || '%' OR h.contents like '%' || #{search} || '%') order by f.inputdate desc
select c.* from customer c, (select following_seq , count(customer_seq) co from follow group by following_seq) f where c.customer_seq = f.following_seq order by f.co desc

select fe.feed_seq,fe.customer_seq,fe.checkin,fe.contents,fe.congestion,fe.likes, fe.inputdate, cu.customer_seq, cu.email, cu.pw, cu.name, cu.nick, cu.profileimg, cu.customer_type from feed fe, customer cu where fe.customer_seq = cu.customer_seq and fe.customer_seq in (select f.following_seq from customer c, follow f where c.customer_seq = #{customer_seq} and c.customer_seq = f.customer_seq) order by fe.inputdate desc
